title: Requires the establishment of an annual employment statistics index for unemployment rate of hamlets and villages of the state
summary: Requires the commissioner of labor to adopt regulations prescribing the methodology for establishing an annual employment statistics index which shows unemployment rates of hamlets and unincorporated villages of the state; and directs such commissioner shall prepare and submit an annual report on such index.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring the establishment of an annual employment statistics index for unemployment rates of hamlets and villages of the state
